card.name: Death Smoke
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.

card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Ballom, Master of Death
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Vashuna, Sword Dancer
card.text: ■ While your opponent has no shields, this creature can't attack. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Miraculous Plague
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Choose 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and destroys the other one. Then choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and puts the other one into his graveyard.

card.name: Dorballom, Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. Then each player puts all non-darkness cards in their mana zone into their graveyard.

card.name: Bangren, Ancient Arhat
card.text: ■ Each of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone gets -1000 power. ''(A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)''

card.name: Dorberos, the Imprisoning Fiend
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Non-darkness creatures cost 2 more to summon.

card.name: Maxval, Electro-Fuuma
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Your darkness creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Olgaiza, Dark Demon of the Evil Fortress
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures gets -1000 power until the End Step ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Supernova Neptune Shutrom
card.text: ■ Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Grand Devils, Demon Commands, and/or Angel Commands. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, your opponent puts all their creatures in the battle zone on the top of their deck in any order. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Cyber Brain
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Draw up to 3 cards.

card.name: Aquan
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from among them into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Jumasol, Bloodcurdling Fuuma
card.text: ■ Each of your Grand Devils in the battle zone and graveyard gets the Demon Command race. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may destroy one of your other Demon Commands instead. ■ Double Breaker
